scripts.install: cd NovelaGraficaApp && npm install && cd ../MultiDocApp/App && npm install
scripts.build: cd NovelaGraficaApp && npm run build && cd ../../MultiDocApp/App && npm run build && cd ../.. && mkdir -p dist/NovelaGraficaApp dist/MultiDocApp/App && cp -r NovelaGraficaApp/dist/* dist/NovelaGraficaApp/ && cp -r MultiDocApp/App/dist/* dist/MultiDocApp/App/ && cp index.html dist/
